mapper.select: SELECT e.address, e.tradetype, e.roomSize, e.floor, e.deposit, e.monthlyPee, SUBSTRING_INDEX(e.img, ',', 1) AS img, COUNT(w.wished_id) AS wishCount FROM Wish w JOIN Estate e ON w.wished_id = e.eno GROUP BY e.eno, e.address, e.tradetype, e.roomSize, e.floor, e.deposit, e.monthlyPee, e.img ORDER BY wishCount DESC LIMIT 4
